name: AS_GCM_QNM_CPS_dropdownField
description: QNM wrapper for the generic CO dropdown field.  Used for displaying an editable response.
sail_code:
/* QUESTION LABEL INCLUDED IN COLLAPSED LABELS FOR ACCESSIBILITY */
{
  a!localVariables(
    local!responseOptions: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
      cdt: ri!question.responseOptions,
      field: "fieldKey",
      value: ri!fieldKey
    ),
    rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_CP_multipleDropdownField(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: a!defaultValue(
        value: ri!labelPosition,
        default: "COLLAPSED"
      ),
      instructions: ri!question.instructions,
      required: ri!required,
      readOnly: ri!readOnly,
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      choiceLabels: local!responseOptions.label,
      choiceValues: local!responseOptions.value,
      placeholderLabel: ri!placeholderLabel,
      value: rule!AS_GCM_QNM_UT_filterToResponsesForQuestionByFieldKey(
        question: ri!question,
        fieldKey: ri!fieldKey
      ).value,
      validations: ri!validations,
      saveInto: if(
        ri!disableSaves,
        {},
        append(
          a!save(
            ri!question,
            rule!AS_GCM_QNM_UT_updateQuestionFieldResponsesForSelectionBasedField(
              question: ri!question,
              fieldKey: ri!fieldKey,
              selectedValues: save!value
            )
          ),
          rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!additionalSaveInto,
            replacementValue: {}
          )
        )
      ),
      validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
      requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      readOnlyValue: ri!readOnlyValue,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    )
  )
}
